content: disturbance in the force socks by marie-elyse dugal in collaboration with alley cat yarns ravelry marie-elyse dugal patterns tipoussins projects instagram @marieelysedugal #disturbanceintheforcesocks these socks were inspired by the star wars universe and the force that flows through each living thing the cables represent the push and pull of the dark and the light side of the force and ultimately its long sought after balance i hope you enjoy knitting these socks and may the force be with you yarn and notions yarn 100g fingering weight sample in smooth sock fingering by alley cat yarns colourway ooak needles 2 5 mm needles see note below with a long cable for magic loop or use your preferred needles such as 9 in circulars or dpns * this pattern features cables which tend to make knits a little tighter i went up a needle size to 2 5mm for that reason if you are a naturally tight knitter you may wish to go up to 2 75 mm other notions cable needle stitch markers scissors darning needle gauge 8 sts = 1 inch in stockinette nota bene special instructions for shortie socks are in blue at the end of the written instructions other options for cuff and heel flap are in purple throughout the main instructions #disturbanceintheforcesocks page 2 of 12 marie-elyse dugal designs abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip slip knit slip the next 2 stitches consecutively knitwise then return these stitches to the left needle and knit them together through the back loop sl slip_stitch purlwise unless otherwise specified sl wyf slip_stitch purlwise while holding the yarn in front of work sl wyb slip_stitch purlwise while holding the yarn at back of work co cast on pm place marker sm slip marker pm/sm place marker the first time you work this round then slip marker when you work this round during further repeats of the pattern bor beginning of round c4b cable 4 back place next 2 stitches on cable needle hold in back of work knit the next 2 stitches from the left hand needle then knit the 2 stitches on the cable needle c4f cable 4 front place next 2 stitches on cable needle hold in front of work knit the next 2 stitches from the left hand needle then knit the 2 stitches on the cable needle t4b twist 4 back place next 2 stitches on cable needle hold in back of work knit the next 2 stitches from the left hand needle then purl the 2 stitches on the cable needle t4f twist 4 front place next 2 stitches on cable needle hold in front of work purl the next 2 stitches from the left hand needle then knit the
